part1: Prior to your 18th birthday, did a parent or other adult in the household often or very often:
part2: Swear at you, insult you, put you down, or humiliate you?
part3: Act in a way that made you afraid that you might be physically hurt?

part1: Prior to your 18th birthday, did a parent or other adult in the household often or very often:
part2: Push, grab, slap, or throw something at you?
part3: Ever hit you so hard that you had marks or were injured?

part1: Prior to your 18th birthday, did an adult or person at least 5 years older than you ever:
part2: Touch or fondle you or have you touch their body in a sexual way?
part3: Attempt or actually have oral, anal, or vaginal intercourse with you?

part1: Prior to your 18th birthday, did you often or very often feel that:
part2: No one in your family loved you or thought you were important or special?
part3: Your family didn't look out for each other, feel close to each other, or support each other?

part1: Prior to your 18th birthday, did you often or very often feel that:
part2: You didn't have enough to eat, had to wear dirty clothes, and had no one to protect you?
part3: Your parents were too drunk or high to take care of you or take you to the doctor if you needed it?

part2: Was a biological parent ever lost to you through divorce, abandonment, or other reason?

part1: Prior to your 18th birthday, was your mother or stepmother:
part2: Often or very often pushed, grabbed, slapped, or had something thrown at her?
part3: Sometimes, often, or very often kicked, bitten, hit with a fist, or hit with something hard?
part4: Ever repeatedly hit over at least a few minutes or threatened with a gun or knife?

part2: Did you live with anyone who was a problem drinker or alcoholic, or who used street drugs?
Was a household member depressed or mentally ill, or did a household member attempt suicide?
Did a household member go to prison?
